Wed, 15 Nov 2023 18:00:00 +0000 The Henry Rongomau Bennett Centre was at 120 per cent occupancy when Joe Carter died in 2019. It is to be replaced with a $115 million 64-bed unit by June 2026. Photo / Michael Craig

Wed, 15 Nov 2023 17:58:48 +0000 The warning applies to shellfish on the east coast of Northland, including the Karikari Peninsula and Pawarenga Harbour.

University of Auckland’s Māori-Samoan researchers receive Cranwell Medal for services during Covid-19 https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-university-maori-samoan-researchers-receive-cranwell-medal-for-services-during-covid-19/PF4GYNNVORF67FX6NE7PJFLZLQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-university-maori-samoan-researchers-receive-cranwell-medal-for-services-during-covid-19/PF4GYNNVORF67FX6NE7PJFLZLQ/ Natalie Netzler wins Cranwell Medal for Māori approach to Covid.Wed, 15 Nov 2023 16:10:00 +0000 Dr Natalie Netzler (pictured), of Ngāti Ruanui, Ngāti Hauā (Māori) and Moto'otua (Samoa) descent, has won the 2023 Cranwell Medal alongside Chris Puli'uvea.
